name: Crunch Time (Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022)
name_original: Crunch Time (Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022)
description:
A dev was asked to make a game for his indecisive boss.  He was asked  specifically for a game that was a dungeon crawler, had cards, rpg elements, a bit of fps, maybe a fight system, funny but in pratice... With that many features to add, will you be able to defeat all the bugs, glitches and placeholders? Only thing you are sure is... it's Crunch Time!

WASD - to Move 

Space - to Dash

 J - to Attack

GabGama as 3d artist and level designer - Nickferr as audio designer - Felipe Aidar as programmer and game designer - Masakia as narrative designer - R4fa23 as programmer, level and game designer - Kuzcotopia as 2d artist and tech artist - Jufrizarin as ui designer
